ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would recommend PLSC 866 to another student. This class provides a great framework for discussing one of the most important issues of our generation, and Professor Weaver is very intelligent and approachable.

I would hesitantly recommend it. I was a bit disappointed and frustrated by our inability to dig deep into the material during discussion. But the topic is too important for me not to tell everyone to take it.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This class did in fact deepen my knowledge of Political Science as a discipline. As an undergraduate student, I knew significantly less than many in the class, but working with them gaveme a new understanding of the disciple, and the specific subsection that Prof. Weaver works in.
